name: Tiny Bears
description:
A lot of strange and lunatics creatures are popping up everywhere. Use your fingers to hit them all before they hide again, because they can drive you crazy. Lots of fun enemies awaits over 60 levels in 4 different worlds.

Will you be at the top of the world ranking in Game Center?
-Optimized for iPhone 5 and iPad Retina Display.
-iCloud sync for your progress.
